name: NPR
text:
Women are often written off in rap and made invisible in the prison system. One Philly rapper is pushing back.
 
@LouderThanARiot's new episode tells the story of Isis Tha Saviour and how she is using hip-hop to transform trauma into freedom. https://t.co/x8TH4qYJWe https://t.co/SKNMPLxmCZ

name: NPR
text: 30 years after his death, Roald Dahl's family has apologized for the author's anti-Semitism. https://t.co/KF8UDBPnYP

name: NPR
text: More than 100,000 customers in Maine and 16,000 in New Hampshire are without power as of Sunday evening. https://t.co/Ftu8Y391QB
